NOTICE_DATA.ORIGINAL_CPV: Furniture (incl. office furniture), furnishings, domestic appliances (excl. lighting) and cleaning products

CODIF_DATA.TD_DOCUMENT_TYPE: Prior information notice without call for competition
CODIF_DATA.RP_REGULATION: European Union, with participation by GPA countries
CODIF_DATA.HEADING: 01B01

TI_TEXT.P: Обзавеждане (включително офис обзавеждане), мебелировка, електродомакински уреди (с изключение на осветителни тела) и продукти за почистване
Nábytek (včetně kancelářského), zařízení interiéru, domácí spotřebiče (mimo osvětlení) a čisticí prostředky
Inventar (inkl. kontorinventar), boligudstyr, husholdningsapparater (ekskl. belysning) og rengøringsmidler
Möbel (einschließlich Büromöbel), Zubehör, Haushaltsgeräte (ausgenommen Beleuchtung) und Reinigungsmittel
Έπιπλα (όπου περιλαμβάνονται έπιπλα γραφείου), επιπλώσεις, οικιακές συσκευές (εκτός από συσκευές φωτισμού) και προϊόντα καθαρισμού
Furniture (incl. office furniture), furnishings, domestic appliances (excl. lighting) and cleaning products
Mobiliario (incluido el de oficina), complementos de mobiliario, aparatos electrodomésticos (excluida la iluminación) y productos de limpieza
Mööbel (sh kontorimööbel), sisustus, kodumasinad (v.a valgustus) ja puhastusvahendid
Huonekalut (myös toimistokalusteet), sisustustavarat, kodinkoneet ja laitteet (valaistusta lukuun ottamatta) ja puhdistustuotteet
Meubles (y compris les meubles de bureau), aménagements, appareils électroménagers (à l'exclusion de l'éclairage) et produits de nettoyage
Furniture (incl. office furniture), furnishings, domestic appliances (excl. lighting) and cleaning products
Namještaj (uključujući uredski namještaj), unutarnja oprema, kućanske naprave (osim rasvjete) i sredstva za čišćenje
Bútorok (beleértve irodai bútorok), lakberendezési cikkek, háztartási berendezések (kivéve világítás) és tisztítótermékek
Mobili (incluso mobili da ufficio), arredamento, apparecchi elettrodomestici (escluso illuminazione) e prodotti per pulizie
Baldai (įskaitant biuro baldus), dekoratyviniai patalpų objektai, buitiniai prietaisai (išskyrus apšvietimo) ir valikliai
Mēbeles (arī biroja mēbeles), mēbelējums, mājsaimniecības ierīces (izņemot apgaismojumu) un tīrīšanas produkti
Għamara (inkluża għamara ta' l-uffiċċju), aċċessorji, apparat domestiku (minbarra dwal) u prodotti tat-tindif
Meubelen (m.i.v. kantoormeubelen), inrichtingsartikelen, huishoudelijke apparaten (uitgez. verlichting) en schoonmaakproducten
Meble (włącznie z biurowymi), wyposażenie, urządzenia domowe (z wyłączeniem oświetlenia) i środki czyszczące
Mobiliário (incl. de escritório), acessórios, aparelhos domésticos (excl. iluminação) e produtos de limpeza
Mobilă (inclusiv mobilă de birou), accesorii de mobilier, aparate de uz casnic (exclusiv dispozitive de iluminat) şi produse de curăţat
Nábytok (vrátane kancelárskeho nábytku), zariadenie interiéru, domáce spotrebiče (s výnimkou osvetlenia) a čistiace prostriedky
Pohištvo (vključno s pisarniškim pohištvom), notranja oprema, gospodinjske naprave (razen svetil) in čistilna sredstva
Möbler (inkl. kontorsmöbler), inredning, hushållsapparater (exkl. belysning) och rengöringsprodukter

SHORT_DESCR.P: The North Western Universities Purchasing Consortium (NWUPC) is a not for profit organisation owned by its Full members consisting of 23 Universities. Our purpose is “to provide a structure for higher education institutions to secure value for money in matters relating to purchasing goods and services”. NWUPC set up and contract manage Framework Agreements in 10 Category areas. Framework Agreements are established to ensure compliance with the European Procurement Regulations which cover Public Sector contracts over a certain threshold value. NWUPC are conducting market engagement for the establishment of a Furniture Framework on behalf of members of the NWUPC and Crescent Purchasing Consortium (CPC). NWUPC are taking a lead role in establishing the Framework on behalf of members of the NWUPC and CPC. To this end, NWUPC are seeking the input of the market place on a number of areas to help inform the structure of the Framework and the scope of requirements. Completion of this questionnaire and any involvement in this market engagement does not confer any right or expectation that the organisation will be selected for any further tender should a procurement exercise be undertaken. By participating in the market engagement questionnaire, you are undertaking that you are authorised to supply any information you provide, and that you understand and agree that:
— participation in this market engagement will not include or preclude any organisation from participating in any future procurement exercise,
— the outcome of the market engagement will aid the Consortium’s development of its tender strategy and will not favour any single response to the market engagement,
— no information provided in the response to the market engagement will be used in any evaluation of any subsequent response to a procurement exercise,
— the outcomes of the market engagement will become the sole property of the Consortium,
— the Consortium reserves the right to disclose the outcomes of the market engagement with partner Consortia and their Members, and NWUPC Member organisations.
A full list of NWUPC members can be found here:
http://www.nwupc.ac.uk/our-members
A full list of CPC members can be found here:
https://www.thecpc.ac.uk/members/
Please complete the survey on the following link:
https://enp.onlinesurveys.ac.uk/nwupc-cpc-furniture-market-engagement-2
The deadline for survey responses is 20.3.2018.

The North Western Universities Purchasing Consortium (NWUPC) is a not for profit organisation owned by its Full members consisting of 23 Universities. Our purpose is “to provide a structure for higher education institutions to secure value for money in matters relating to purchasing goods and services”. NWUPC set up and contract manage Framework Agreements in 10 Category areas. Framework Agreements are established to ensure compliance with the European Procurement Regulations which cover Public Sector contracts over a certain threshold value. NWUPC are conducting market engagement for the establishment of a Furniture Framework on behalf of members of the NWUPC and Crescent Purchasing Consortium (CPC). NWUPC are taking a lead role in establishing the Framework on behalf of members of the NWUPC and CPC. To this end, NWUPC are seeking the input of the market place on a number of areas to help inform the structure of the Framework and the scope of requirements. Completion of this questionnaire and any involvement in this market engagement does not confer any right or expectation that the organisation will be selected for any further tender should a procurement exercise be undertaken. By participating in the market engagement questionnaire, you are undertaking that you are authorised to supply any information you provide, and that you understand and agree that:
— participation in this market engagement will not include or preclude any organisation from participating in any future procurement exercise,
— the outcome of the market engagement will aid the Consortium’s development of its tender strategy and will not favour any single response to the market engagement,
— no information provided in the response to the market engagement will be used in any evaluation of any subsequent response to a procurement exercise,
— the outcomes of the market engagement will become the sole property of the Consortium,
— the Consortium reserves the right to disclose the outcomes of the market engagement with partner Consortia and their Members, and NWUPC Member organisations.
A full list of NWUPC members can be found here:
http://www.nwupc.ac.uk/our-members
A full list of CPC members can be found here:
https://www.thecpc.ac.uk/members/
Please complete the survey on the following link:
https://enp.onlinesurveys.ac.uk/nwupc-cpc-furniture-market-engagement-2
The deadline for survey responses is 20.3.2018.
